transcript.text: [Music]
hi and welcome you listening to the x-22

economy brace for impact
let's get into the economic collapse

elite not just here in the United States
but we're seeing it in Italy where they
had the referendum we saw it in the UK
where they had the brexit and we see
here in the united states and we can see
the establishment is reeling right now
because they don't want to give up our
and remember the central bankers the

they want and we're already seeing this

they're saying their presidential

this is coming from Ben Bradshaw he's

he's saying that the hacking here in the

there's no evidence but we can see why
they're all doing this right now they're

the central banking system the elite the

we've been tracking this collapse for

we've been talking about unemployment
we've been talking about real estate
we've been talking about GDP we've been

it makes no sense because when we look

us that everyone's employed right now
should
so that should mean that retail should

unemployment is very low GDP is very

people aren't spending they don't have
the jobs they don't have the money
they're not spending and right now in

Cyber Monday
retail sales they only moved up point
one percent month on month they thought
it was going to rise point three percent
now one of the biggest drivers of

see it wasn't just Motor Vehicles we see
that department stores well they are
down
negative point two percent during the

right now from what we've been looking

and when we look at this we know that

think about this they moved up a little

there's sheetrock sales there's

because remember they inflated these

we see industrial production well for

and this is the longest streak you know

every economic indicator that we've been
